title: Exploring Pivot Viability
purpose: Assess whether current browser overlay path is ceiling and consider intelligence pivot

messages.author: user
messages.content: maybe this overlay approach is the ceiling—are we on the right path?

messages.author: ai
messages.content: Flag received. I'll surface constraints: stability, legal exposure, platform variance. Then propose pivot options.

messages.author: ai
messages.content: Risks: 1) Fragile DOM dependency 2) Potential TOS friction 3) High maintenance per site. Pivot vectors: A) Conversation intelligence B) Local pattern mining C) Workflow guidance.

messages.author: ai
messages.content: Intelligence Path: ingest chat → segment phases → extract recurring micro patterns → build cognitive profile → surface adaptive guidance.

messages.author: user
messages.content: good. proceed with that pivot direction.

segments.label: Pivot Selection
segments.rationale: User requests and approves new path

summaries.micro: User questions trajectory; assistant surfaces risks and offers pivot; user authorizes intelligence direction.
summaries.macro: Strategic reassessment leads to a decisive pivot from UI overlay complexity toward conversation intelligence capabilities.
insights: User reacts quickly to structured risk lists
recommendations: Keep future pivots framed as 3-option sets
